DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether contraceptive compliance young woman improve expand counsel health educator initial clinic visit compare standard care .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Sexually active female 16 24 year age present University Texas Medical Branch ( UTMB ) clinic request initiate oral contraception birth control . Exclusion criterion : Women currently pregnant breastfeeding . Women wish become pregnant within next 12 month . Women medical contraindication use estrogen ( e.g. , thromboembolic disease , acute liver disease , breast cancer , genital cancer , undiagnosed genital bleeding ) . Women wish initiate use contraceptive method oral , transdermal ( patch ) injectable ( DMPA ) method , vaginal ring . Current previous user oral contraceptive .
